name: Perfect Raizer
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If you do not have another card with "Raizer" in its card name on your (VC) or (RC), this unit gets [Power] -2000.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +3000 for each card in your soul with "Raizer" in its card name.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if the number of cards in your soul with "Raizer" in its card name is four or more, this unit gets [Critical] +1.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), put all rear-guards you have with "Raizer" in its card name into your soul.

name: Dueling Dragon, ZANBAKU
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If you have a non-<Murakumo> vanguard or rear-guard, this unit gets [Power] -2000.
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your opponent's ride phase, if your opponent has a grade 3 or greater vanguard, your opponent may choose a card from his or her hand, and discard it. If your opponent does not, your opponent cannot normal ride during that ride phase.

name: Hi-powered Raizer Custom
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have a unit named "Battleraizer" in the back row of the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power] +8000.

name: Golden Beast Tamer
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):Restraint (This unit cannot attack.)
[ACT](VC/RC): This unit loses "Restraint" until end of turn.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your <Pale Moon> rear-guards in your front row get [Power] +3000.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose a <Pale Moon> <Chimera> from your soul, and call it to (RC).

name: Machining Stag Beetle
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose up to two <Megacolony> with "Machining" in its card name from your soul, call them to separate (RC) as [Rest], and increase this unit's [Power] by the sum of the original [Power] of the units called with this effect until end of turn.

name: Imperial Daughter
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):Restraint (This unit cannot attack.)
[ACT](VC/RC):[Counter-Blast 1 & Choose another of your <Oracle Think Tank> rear-guards, and put it into your soul] This unit loses "Restraint" until end of turn.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you do not have any rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1 and loses "Restraint".

name: Weather Forecaster, Miss Mist
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (GC), if it is during the battle in which your opponent's grade 2 or less vanguard attacked, choose one of your <Oracle Think Tank> that is being attacked, and that unit cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Miss Splendor
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks, your opponent's units cannot intercept ([Intercept]) until end of that battle.

name: Rocket Hammer Man
effect: [ACT](RC):[Rest] this unit] Choose another of your <Nova Grappler>, and that unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.

name: Twin Swordsman, MUSASHI
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks, if the number of rear-guards you have is more than your opponent's, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle.

name: Promise Daughter
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):[Choose an <Oracle Think Tank> from your hand, and discard it] When this unit attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Bellicosity Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, if you have a <Kagero> vanguard, choose a card from your damage zone, and turn it face up.

name: Guard Griffin
effect: [AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 1] When this unit is placed on (GC), if you have a <Kagero> vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Sage of Guidance, Zenon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a <Royal Paladin> vanguard, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a <Royal Paladin> with the same grade as your vanguard, ride it, and if it is not, put that card into your drop zone.

name: Savage King
effect: [ACT](VC/RC):[Soul-Blast 1 & Choose another of your <Tachikaze> rear-guards, and retire it] This unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

name: Boomerang Thrower
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit rides a <Nova Grappler>, this unit gets "[CONT](VC):If this unit would attack, it may instead attack an opponent's unit in the back row." until end of turn.

name: Raizer Custom
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have a unit named "Battleraizer" in the back row of the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power] +6000.

name: Wall Boy
effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)

name: Cat Butler
effect: [AUTO](RC):［Retire this unit］ At the beginning of the close step of the battle that your vanguard attacked, if the attack did not hit during that battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your grade 2 or less <Nova Grappler> vanguards, and [Stand] it.

name: Battleraizer
effect:
[AUTO]:When another <Nova Grappler> rides this unit, you may call this card to (RC).
[AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, the boosted unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle, and at the beginning of the end phase of that turn, return this unit to your deck, and shuffle your deck.

name: Jumping Jill
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from your soul, if you have a <Pale Moon> vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

name: Nitro Juggler
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have a <Pale Moon> vanguard, you may [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Starting Presenter
effect: [AUTO]:When another <Pale Moon> rides this unit, you may [Soul-Charge 2].

name: Lark Pigeon
effect: [AUTO]Soul:At the beginning of your guard step, if you have a <Pale Moon> vanguard, and you do not have any cards in your hand, you may call this card to (GC) as [Rest].

name: Swift Archer, FUSHIMI
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit rides a <Murakumo>, this unit gets "[CONT](VC):If this unit would attack, it may instead attack an opponent's unit in the back row." until end of turn.

effect: [CONT](RC) in the left column of the front row:If you have a <Murakumo> vanguard, and you have a unit named "Right Arrester" on (RC) in the right column of the front row, this unit gets [Power] +3000.

name: Right Arrester
effect: [CONT](RC) in the right column of the front row:If you have a <Murakumo> vanguard, and you have a unit named "Left Arrester" on (RC) in the left column of the front row, this unit gets [Power] +3000.

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have a <Megacolony> with "Machining" in its card name in your soul, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have a <Megacolony> with "Machining" in its card name in your soul, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your rear-guards with "Machining" in its card name, and [Stand] it.

name: Prowling Dragon, Striken
effect:

[AUTO](VC):When this unit is attacked, if there are no boosting ([Boost]) units, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
[AUTO]:When another <Kagero> rides this unit, choose one of your vanguards, and that unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.
